title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' operation in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui module of jdt.ui, the destination is being displayed as 'xxx', which is incorrect.
OB: When performing a 'copy package' operation, the destination is displayed as 'xxx'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Create a new project ('xxx2').
2. Open the Package viewer.
3. Select a package in project A.
4. From the context menu, choose 'copy'.
